channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Minivans parked illegally again, 11th August
item.description:
More minivans left in all the parking bays parked illegally, badly and one is in a disabled bay. Please find out who is leaving these every week. The residents can't park.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Heathland Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle Irish men come and dump this car no tax,no MOT, no insurance. Address this criminal activity behaviour., 11th August
item.description:
Abandoned dumped vehicle in a state car park for many months.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Prince Edward Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars parking on the pavement blocking access, 11th August
item.description:
Cars are regularly parking half on the pavement and half on the road - They are blocking vehicle access to the rear of the shops and properties. There are some vehicles parking on the pedestrian only/pavement in front of the dry cleaners and cafe. There needs to be bollards installed near the curb.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 168, Shooters Hill Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No dropped curb for driveway usage, 11th August
item.description:
There is a dropped curb missing from the front garden which is used as a drive regularly to park car.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fosters Close, Elmstead, London

item.title: URGENT Recurring Human excrement /faeces outside number 2, 11th August
item.description:
Huge amount of Human excrement /faeces outside Green garage door of 2 Ormond Yard - always happening at this spot not fair please pick up before street washing with disinfectant as the human faeces gets washed into house if not picked up first before street washing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ormond Yard, Mayfair, City of Westminster

item.title: A resident called that someone has dumped about 2 sofas near the bin on loddiges Road. Says her concern is if not picked earlier that the homeless will turn the area into habbitation place due to the free sofa. So she wants it collected soon., 11th August
